resources.string:
It looks like your body temperature is lower than the average body temperature.


In spite of receiving the result, you should not worry because the application is in test mode and its result cannot be used as a medical report.

It looks like your body temperature is within normal limits.


The application is in test mode and its result cannot be used as a medical report.

It looks like your body temperature is higher than the average body temperature.


In spite of receiving the result, you should not worry because the application is in test mode and its result cannot be used as a medical report.
Cover the oval area with your face to begin evaluating your temperature.\n\nThe video will not be saved anywhere.
Scan the QR code with your phone camera to provide feedback on your experience
We look forward to hearing from you about our product.

If you just came from outside, please wait for at least 10 minutes indoors before measuring.\n\nIf you want to get your temperature measured, just step a little closer. Then follow the instructions on the screen.
The idea of the app is to estimate the user\'s temperature. The measured result is not absolute but indicative.
There\'s a thermal camera at the top of the tablet which is used for the measurement.

Developed by Toni Hämäläinen,
Miika Ponkilainen, Eero Tuure,
Vadim Zubchenko, Jukka Övermark.
The application is a part of Metropolia's innovation projects and has been implemented in cooperation with 
LeViteZer.
Enter password to exit auto mode.
